name: Three Little Bears
description: A great adventure of three little bears. Be the bear you want to be or... be them all. Each bear must leave their comfortable dens and begin a challenging journey. Time, weather or poachers are just some of the obstacles you will have to overcome. Fortunately, you will meet many helpers on your way and cozy huts, when you get tired. Riddles, puzzles and quite a lot of magic. Three bears, three adventures, one big goal. Can you reach it?
